2009 the original poster stated that

regular images to appear paranormal and
wondered if the users could create and
then spread a spooky image to garner
mainstream attention potentially by
attaching it to a unique story after
some humorous trials and tribulations
user victor serge won the unofficial
competition by posting two doctored
images of unnamed children with a tall
or faceless man standing behind or near
them those in the thread would pitch
back and forth possible stories to add
to these along with additional images
and eventually a modern legend was born
that of a lanky and mysterious figure
who stalks children in broad daylight
taking them away under mysterious
circumstances he would be called many
things in the coming years the negative
the operator the beast but most
